name: Space War (itch) (Akinremi)
description:
Made in 10 hours for a Game Gen! The theme was Space War.

In this game it's involves two monochrome spaceships called "the needle" and "the wedge", each controlled by a player, attempting to shoot one another while maneuvering on a two-dimensional plane in the gravity well of a star, set against the backdrop of a starfield.

The only controls are pushing the control buttons to move the ship and shoot. You'll figure it out! ;)
